title: Pinoy
summary: Pinoy (/ˈpɪnɔɪ/ Tagalog: ['pɪnɔi]) is a common informal self-reference used by Filipinos to refer to citizens of the Philippines and their culture as well as to overseas Filipinos in the Filipino diaspora.[1][2] A Pinoy with a mix of foreign ancestry is often informally called Tisoy, a shortened word for Mestizo.
